name: Tomb Legion
book: Pathfinder Companion: Osirion, Land of Pharaohs, Copyright 2008, Paizo Publishing, LLC
effect: 3 or more mummies, no 2 of which can be more than 30 ft. apart; see text
text: This spell functions like shambler, except that it calls into existence 1d4+2 mummies rather than shambling mounds.
target_zh: 3只或更多的木乃伊，两两之间不能超过30呎见下文
text_zh: 这个法术类似于蔓生术(shambler) ，除了它是召唤1D4+2只木乃伊而不是蔓生怪。
